creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello,
I am using a Java Sampler named 's4-1-s1' , this sampler is of class :
org.apache.jmeter.protocol.java.test.SleepTest 

In results table this sampler appears with label:
"Sleep Test: time = <Number of slept ms>"


As I am using many of these, I find it difficult and disturbing to read results.

I provide a patch to this to make it use its initial name "s4-1-s1" in this example, instead of this one:"Sleep Test: time = <Number of slept ms>"



Regards
Philippe M.
http://www.ubik-ingenierie.com

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Not sure it's worth fixing this.

You can use the Java Sampler / Java Test sampler which does not have this problem.

If you aren't interested in generating a sample, merely pausing, then the Test Action sampler might be more appropriate.
